did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Scrapbook chiefly of clippings, and photographs relating to athletic activities as a member of the basketball team, kept while a student at The University of Arizona.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook chiefly of clippings, and photographs relating to athletic activities as a member of the basketball team, kept while a student at The University of Arizona.
